issue.title: Develop an alert plugin for back-end
issue.body:
**Original author :** Mérour Xavier

To get a better view on monitored services, it would be of great help to have alerts displayed directly on Welcome administration panel.

A simple Joomla! plugin could be developed with the following logic :

Get all jobs with status different from "available"
Return the list of the jobs + status + date/time

To be discussed
